column4: in official ubuntu site I read that 8.04 maintained until 2011 and 8.10 until 2010. what that means?
'Support' refers to security updates and community tech support.

Use whichever you want.  Check out the 8.10 release notes to see if there are any incompatibilities.  One of the most oft reported issues is with graphics cards, but its mentioned in the release notes.
